data.lyric:
[ti:Outside]
[ar:Mo3/OG Bobby Billions]
[al:Outside]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.27]Outside - Mo3/OG Bobby Billions
[00:02.95]Yeah yeah
[00:08.16]They scared to come outside
[00:12.32]Tell them boys they better pray
[00:14.60]Tell them boys stay out the way
[00:16.85]Tell them ain't nobody safe
[00:18.36]On my mama on my gang
[00:20.69]We gon' put it in they face
[00:22.94]Yeah
[00:23.50]They scared to come outside
[00:26.47]MO3：
[00:27.56]N***as know we stepping night and day
[00:30.94]God know I'm stepping now and later
[00:33.07]Until it hurts it ain't no mercy
[00:34.32]That's just how we made it
[00:36.06]You hear that church up in my verses
[00:37.74]'Cause that's how I'm raised
[00:39.89]I told God He gotta forgive me I'm insane oh
[00:42.83]
[00:43.36]Get down on my knees when I'm in pain oh
[00:46.51]Tired of the rain on my name
[00:47.95]I clean this blood off my Jesus piece
[00:51.15]Ooh Jesus please
[00:53.09]Can you fill my needs
[00:55.05]Yeah
[00:55.96]Tired of f**kin' up I'm in the streets ayy
[00:58.82]Tryna take away this hurt inside of me
[01:00.91]They scared to come outside
[01:03.66]God I need a second chance
[01:05.32]Knowin' that I love you but sometimes I do the Devil dance
[01:08.23]Lost a couple of my patnas so I'm slidin' out on whoever end
[01:11.30]Drop one of them n***as
[01:12.42]When I kill em call the reverend yeah
[01:14.95]Yeah
[01:17.24]'Cause no weapon formed against me shall prosper yeah
[01:20.55]Gotta know I'm clutchin' on this choppa yeah
[01:23.66]Waiting on them boys outside
[01:24.88]MO3/OG Bobby Billions/MO3：
[01:25.63]They scared to come outside
[01:27.84]Ooh wee yeah yeah
[01:29.79]N***as know we stepping night and day
[01:32.90]N***as know we stepping now and later
[01:35.05]Until it hurts it ain't no mercy that's just how we made
[01:38.06]You hear that church up in my verses
[01:39.51]'Cause that's just how we raised
[01:40.92]OG Bobby Billions：
[01:41.85]Dawg I feel cursed I pray for better days
[01:44.65]Seems like yesterday we was catching plays
[01:47.13]And it's been harder on me lately I can't catch a break
[01:49.89]I'm losing n***as on a day to day
[01:53.14]Everyday I pray
[01:54.71]Only God can take this hate away
[01:57.14]Lord knows if I see em I'm gon' have to spray
[01:58.87]
[01:59.60]You know the same spot I seen 'em is the spot he lay
[02:02.74]I cleaned his blood off my Jesus piece
[02:06.40]Jesus please say there's a heaven for a real one
[02:09.68]I had to smoke 'em even Moses had to kill one
[02:12.32]Do it for the bills I swear this s**t is getting ill
[02:14.21]MO3/OG Bobby Billions/MO3：
[02:15.06]They scared to come outside
[02:17.26]Ooh-wee yeah yeah
[02:19.39]N***as know we stepping night and day
[02:20.98]Know I'm stepping night and day
[02:22.47]N***as know we stepping now and later
[02:23.82]Yeah yeah
[02:24.12]Until it hurts it ain't no mercy that's just how we made
[02:27.25]You hear that church up in my verses
[02:28.65]'Cause that's just how we raised
[02:30.23]MO3：
[02:30.85]Ooh you hear church up in my verse 'cause that's just how I'm raised
[02:34.98]Glock off in my britches that just how I'm came
[02:37.75]Keep a 30 on me n***a don't get out the way
[02:40.77]Why-y-y-y-y-y-y
[02:44.56]Yeah Lord I get my preacher on
[02:48.45]Yeah big ol' Desert Eagle on
[02:50.54]Flier than an eagle big ol' shooter pull up in them Regals uh
[02:53.45]Drop out none of my people
[02:54.51]This that gang gang I put them demons on you
[02:56.47]P***y a*s n***a not equal we tote heaters
[02:58.39]I got that ether uh
[02:59.57]They didn't believe I'm the people's choice
[03:01.58]They didn't believe in us
[03:02.63]Run down on you in them Adidas uh
[03:04.70]Yea they scared to come outside
data.trans:
[ti:Outside]
[ar:Mo3/OG Bobby Billions]
[al:Outside]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:01.27]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.95]//
[00:08.16]他们怕得不敢出门
[00:12.32]告诉他们 最好虔诚祈祷
[00:14.60]告诉他们 别来招惹我
[00:16.85]告诉他们 没有谁能保全自身
[00:18.36]为了我妈妈 为了我的帮派
[00:20.69]我们会跟他们正面刚
[00:22.94]//
[00:23.50]他们怕得不敢出门
[00:26.47]//
[00:27.56]那些家伙知道我们日夜步履不停
[00:30.94]上帝知道我现在以及将来都不会罢休
[00:33.07]直到伤害落下 绝不会心慈手软
[00:34.32]我们就是那样做的
[00:36.06]你在我的歌词里听见了教堂的风格
[00:37.74]因为我从小就在那里耳濡目染
[00:39.89]我告诉上帝 他得原谅我 我是个疯子
[00:42.83]
[00:43.36]我要是觉得痛苦 就会跪下向上帝祈求
[00:46.51]厌倦了我的名声惹来的风风雨雨
[00:47.95]我清理干净了十字架上的血迹
[00:51.15]上帝 拜托
[00:53.09]你能为我实现愿望吗
[00:55.05]//
[00:55.96]不想再搞砸 我在街头
[00:58.82]试图抹去我心中的伤痛
[01:00.91]他们怕得不敢出门
[01:03.66]上帝 我需要第二次的机会
[01:05.32]您知道我爱戴着您 但有时候我得与恶魔共舞
[01:08.23]我失去了几个兄弟 所以不管最后是谁 我都不会善罢甘休
[01:11.30]干掉他们其中一个
[01:12.42]等我杀了他们 打电话给牧师
[01:14.95]//
[01:17.24]因为没有哪个对准我的武器 能够成功做掉我
[01:20.55]要知道我可是带着这威力十足的家伙
[01:23.66]在外面等着他们
[01:24.88]//
[01:25.63]他们怕得不敢出门
[01:27.84]//
[01:29.79]那些家伙知道我们日夜步履不停
[01:32.90]那些家伙知道我们现在以及将来都不会罢休
[01:35.05]直到伤害落下 绝不会心慈手软 我们就是那样做的
[01:38.06]你在我的歌词里听见了教堂的风格
[01:39.51]因为我从小就在那里耳濡目染
[01:40.92]//
[01:41.85]伙计 我感觉自己受到了诅咒 我祈祷拥有更幸福的生活
[01:44.65]似乎昨天我们还在无忧无虑地玩乐
[01:47.13]最近我的日子更加艰难 我没有喘息的时间
[01:49.89]我每天都会失去几个兄弟
[01:53.14]每一天我都在祈祷
[01:54.71]只有上帝能抹去我的仇恨
[01:57.14]上帝知道 我要是见到他们 我会开枪扫射
[01:58.87]
[01:59.60]你知道只要跟我碰面 那他就会当场丧命
[02:02.74]我清理干净了他溅在我十字架上的血
[02:06.40]上帝啊 请告诉我有容纳真性情之人的天堂存在
[02:09.68]我必须解决掉他们 就算Moses必须要杀掉一个
[02:12.32]为了钱去拼命 我发誓这都太病态了
[02:14.21]//
[02:15.06]他们怕得不敢出门
[02:17.26]//
[02:19.39]那些家伙知道我们日夜步履不停
[02:20.98]知道我日夜步履不停
[02:22.47]那些家伙知道我们现在以及将来都不会罢休
[02:23.82]//
[02:24.12]直到伤害落下 绝不会心慈手软 我们就是那样做的
[02:27.25]你在我的歌词里听见了教堂的风格
[02:28.65]因为我从小就在那里耳濡目染
[02:30.23]//
[02:30.85]你在我的歌词里听见了教堂的风格 因为我从小就在那里耳濡目染
[02:34.98]裤兜里揣着格洛克 我这一路就是这样走来的
[02:37.75]拿枪指着我 伙计 别逃啊
[02:40.77]为什么
[02:44.56]上帝 我的牧师为我做好了准备
[02:48.45]那把硕大又老旧的沙漠之鹰
[02:50.54]比雄鹰威力更强 硕大又老旧的枪 豪车停在他们面前
[02:53.45]退出 我的人一个都不会退出
[02:54.51]这个帮派 那个帮派 我让恶魔对你们纠缠不休
[02:56.47]我们跟那种贱畜绝不等同 我们随身带枪
[02:58.39]我掌控宇宙
[02:59.57]他们不相信 我是人民的选择
[03:01.58]他们不相信我们
[03:02.63]穿着阿迪达斯撞上了你
[03:04.70]他们怕得不敢出门
